warscrolls.name: Beast-skewer Killbow
warscrolls.fluff: The idea of an orruk that can shoot straight seems like a contradiction, but they do exist – those who operate the portable ballistas known as Beast-skewer Killbows can not only bullseye a target but also slay several smaller enemies with a single shot.

abilities.name: Skewering Bolts
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: When sighting a particularly large target, the crew load vicious skewering bolts that can tear through even the mightiest of beasts.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Beast-skewer Bolts is 6 if the target is a MONSTER.

abilities.name: Pick 'Em Off
abilities.lore: Once set up in position, the Beast-skewer Killbow takes its time to line up every shot with deadly results.
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a MOVE ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Breaka-boss on Mirebrute Troggoth
warscrolls.fluff: The Breaka-boss towers over their minions, largely because they ride upon the shoulders of a massive Mirebrute Troggoth. By goading this dim-witted beast, they can drive it into a frenzy – though it is the enemy that feels its wrath.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.lore: Troggoths are able to regrow injured flesh almost as quickly as it is harmed.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Tear Limb From Limb
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: Mirebrute Troggoths take great delight plucking foes from the enemy ranks and pulling off their limbs one by one.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy INFANTRY unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Breaka-harness
abilities.lore: When a Breaka-boss enters combat, they yank their Mirebrute Troggoth’s harness savagely to get the beast good and angry!
abilities.effect:
Make a breaka-roll of D3.

•  Inflict an amount of mortal damage on this unit equal to the breaka-roll.
•  Double the breaka-roll and add that value to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Mirebrute’s Clubs for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Da Kunnin' Krew
warscrolls.fluff: Mannok da Kunnin’ is a member of the Beastbreakaz tribe; with his envenomed tri-prodda and cruel lash, he can reduce even the toughest opponents to spasming wrecks. Da Kunnin’ Krew is a ragtag collection of orruks, hobgrots and grots. It is led by the armoured Torka Tuffskul, an expert at corralling foes with his spiked mansnappa. He is backed up by two grots, Gikkit and Shank, who are kept in line by a malicious paymaster known as Krookgrin.

abilities.name: Easy Meat
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Showing weakness to a Kruleboy, even for a moment, is a death sentence.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

warscrolls.name: Daggok's Stab-ladz
warscrolls.fluff: Daggok and his ladz are on a murderous mission to decapitate the realms’ brightest fighters. With each head Daggok takes, his kunnin’ increases – or so he believes – and he means to gather enough smarts to make him a Killaboss.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/4), Destruction, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Roar of Kragnos
abilities.lore: The massive horn carried by Hurrk da Howla emits a booming blast that leaves the Stab-ladz’ enemies disorientated.
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Hurrk da Howla is on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Foot of Gork
warscrolls.fluff: No spell is as beloved of orruk-kind as the Foot of Gork. It is brutality made manifest: a huge, warty green foot formed of riotous magic that descends from the sky and squashes anything beneath it flat. One foot follows the descent of the other, smashing colossal craters in the earth that glow with a weird Waaagh!-light. The fact that the Foot of Gork is almost impossible to direct once it has landed doesn’t much bother the orruks, for wherever it stomps, it’s bound to result in a good time.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+) Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Wandering Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: You can’t expect Gork to stand still when there’s fighting about.
abilities.declare: Pick a part of this MANIFESTATION to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 9" of the other part of this MANIFESTATION.

Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 3" of the target. On a 2+:

• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• That unit has the STOMPED keyword until the start of your next turn.
• Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for STOMPED units, to a minimum of 1.

abilities.name: Multiple Parts
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this MANIFESTATION’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this MANIFESTATION is destroyed and all its parts are removed from play.

warscrolls.name: Gobsprakk, the Mouth of Mork
warscrolls.fluff: Most infamous of all Swampcalla Shamans is Gobsprakk. He is the greatest prophet of orruk-kind, the Mouth of Mork, and it is clear the favour of the kunnin’ god is upon him. Green energy crackles around Gobsprakk when his ire is raised, and even the biggest orruks have learnt to fear the narrowing of the shaman’s eyes, for someone’s sudden demise follows soon after. Those who cross him have a strange habit of choking to death as their lungs fill with swamp water, even if they are standing upon an arid plain. Should an enemy survive his perfidious spells, they are snatched up in the talons of his beloved Corpse-rippa Vulcha, Killabeak.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Ward (6+), Destruction, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Killabeak’s Talons and Beak is 5.

abilities.name: Strangle Hex
abilities.lore: Coiling tendrils of magic burst from Gobsprakk’s outstretched hand, choking the life from the target.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic, to a maximum of 10. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Crush to Death
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Gobsprakk’s mount, Killabeak, takes wicked delight in crushing smaller foes in its talons.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Mork Sez No!
abilities.lore: As enemy wizards foolishly attempt to weave their magics, Gobsprakk summons tapewyrm sguigs into their guts and fills their minds with so much Waaagh! energy that they sometimes explode!
abilities.effect: Each time this unit unbinds a spell, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster. If the unbinding roll was 10+, inflict D6 mortal damage on the caster instead.

abilities.name: Screamin' Mandrakk
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.lore: The awful sound this plant emits wreaks havoc on the concentration of enemy wizards.
abilities.effect: This unit uses the ‘Unbind’ ability but the unbinding roll is 3D6 instead of 2D6.

warscrolls.name: Gork-Roara
warscrolls.fluff: From the jaws of a Gork-Roara spews forth the destructive magic of the Waaagh!. Shamans who breathe in this glowing mist find their connection to that primal energy heightened – all for the measly risk of being driven entirely out of their minds. Gork-Roaras share the orruks’ exuberance in battle, howling bloodthirsty invective and jeering battle cries. Should they linger after the din of combat has faded, they will bellow and howl in indignation. Given that the same is true of especially warlike bosses, no orruk really seems to mind.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Bellowing Waaagh!-Cries
abilities.lore: Spurred on by the carnage sweeping the battlefield, the Gork-Roara spews out great drifts of Waaagh! energy that orruks tap into – knowingly or otherwise.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ or KRULEBOYZ WIZARD or PRIEST within 3" of this MANIFESTATION to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Pick either 1 or 2 to add to casting rolls or chanting rolls for the target until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a number of dice equal to the number picked. For each 1-2, allocate 1 damage point to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). For each 5+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly KRULEBOYZ or IRONJAWZ units while they are wholly within 12" of this MANIFESTATION.

Friendly units can be affected by this ability multiple times and the effects are cumulative.

warscrolls.name: Gutrippaz
warscrolls.fluff: Gutrippaz form the slimy heart of the Kruleboyz. These mobs of sadistic greenskins are known for their vicious kunnin’ and the spiteful amusement they find in laying low the enemy with their wicked, poisoned weapons.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Destruction, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Scare Taktikz
abilities.lore: Gutrippaz use all manner of means to unnerve and soften up their foes before the first blow is struck, from gruesome ‘skareshields’ to ululating battle cries that echo from the boggy mists.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by non-HERO units that target this unit for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Hobgrot Slittaboss
warscrolls.fluff: Slittabosses command the hobgrot kompanies that maraud across the realms in search of plunder. They are not only the most physically imposing and dark-hearted of their kind but also the canniest. Each is a master swindler and murderous in ripping loot from the battlefield, no matter who currently possesses it.

abilities.name: Toxic Stash
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: A Slittaboss’s swindling talents are used to secure choice poisons that can overwhelm even a stamping ogor.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy INFANTRY HERO in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Kompany Taktikz
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Slittabosses drill their hobgrots without mercy – after all, the more decisively they strike, the better chance they have of grabbing up the loot.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly Hobgrot Slittaz unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Hobgrot Slittaz
warscrolls.fluff: Mobs of Hobgrot Slittaz have often been witnessed accompanying the Kruleboyz orruks to war. These malicious little brutes delight in eviscerating the foe with their slitta-knives and employing explosive devices pilfered from their duardin paymasters to blow unlucky enemies apart.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Destruction, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Scrap-bang
abilities.lore: By detonating their scrap-grenades at the feet of the foe, Hobgrot Slittaz can scarper off to a safe distance.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
• This unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

warscrolls.name: Killaboss on Corpse-rippa Vulcha
warscrolls.fluff: The Killaboss rules through strength as well as cunning, for they have an expert eye for picking out an enemy’s weak spot and driving a blade into it. In battle, those who ride the immense raptor-like creatures known as Corpse-rippa Vulchas dive out of the mists without warning, striking from nowhere to gut the enemy force.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Vulcha’s Talons and Beak is 5.

abilities.name: Commanding View
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly Gutrippaz unit wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.lore: From his position high above the battlefield, a Killaboss riding a Corpse-rippa Vulcha can keep a careful eye on the battle, guiding the movements of their ladz.
abilities.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

abilities.name: Vulcha Dive
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Corpse-rippa crashes down into the enemy’s ranks from on high, tearing into reeling warriors with cruel relish.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Killaboss on Great Gnashtoof
warscrolls.fluff: Particularly storied Killabosses are able to procure all manner of terrifying, swamp-dwelling mounts from the Beast-breakaz to show off their status. Great Gnashtoofs are one such monster, huge and vicious hounds whose swiftness is matched only by their ferocity.

abilities.name: All Part of Da Plan
abilities.lore: Kruleboyz tend to be very impressed by a Killaboss’s kunnin’ feats – so long as the boss has a plan, they are willing to face down even the most unlikely odds.
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly KRULEBOYZ unit wholly within 9" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: That's Ours, Ya Gitz!
abilities.lore: Kruleboyz are raiders by nature, and the Killabosses are expert at getting the boyz all worked up when they see territory or loot that they’d love to get their dirty hands on.
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective you do not control, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly KRULEBOYZ units wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Killaboss with Stab-grot
warscrolls.fluff: Killabosses are the warlords of the Kruleboyz. Each has wrested their position from rivals by being not only a potent warrior but also possessed of true Morkish kunnin’, willing to use anyone or anything to garner an advantage.

abilities.name: Keep 'Em In Line
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared the ‘All-out Attack’ command for a friendly KRULEBOYZ INFANTRY unit
abilities.lore: With a threatening glare and barked commands, the Killaboss keeps their boyz in formation.
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within 12" of the unit using the ‘All-out Attack’ command, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by that unit for the rest of the phase.

abilities.name: Unleash the Stab-grot!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: A Stab-grot isn’t just good for stabbin’ – they double up as an effective living shield when things get dicey.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

• Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target. Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.
• This unit has WARD (5+) for the rest of the turn.

After resolving either effect, remove this unit’s Stab-grot from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Stab-grot
abilities.effect: This unit’s Stab-grot is a token. If this unit’s Stab-grot has been removed, it can no longer attack with its Stab-grot’s Shiv and it cannot use the ‘Unleash the Stab-grot!’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Kragnos, the End of Empires
warscrolls.fluff: One of the most destructive races to have ever lived, the Drogrukh were centauroid warriors who built a great nation in the Realm of Beasts. From their number rose a champion so powerful that he ascended to godhood: Kragnos, the End of Empires. Having led his people in warfare against a draconic empire that left the Drogrukh all but extinct, Kragnos was sealed away for the protection of the realms – only to be freed centuries later.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Ward (5+), Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of The Dread Mace is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.lore: Tuskbreaker has the power to guard Kragnos against even the most potent magical force.
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per SPELL ability.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.lore: Kragnos is the embodiment of Ghur’s relentless ferocity. No single strike can lay him low.
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.lore: Where Kragnos goes, the hordes of Destruction follow.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly DESTRUCTION units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Kragnos rampages through the press of his foes, his hooves flattening all in his path.
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).

warscrolls.name: Kruleboyz Monsta-killaz
warscrolls.fluff: Masters of the sudden ambush and the devious ruse, the Kruleboyz known as Monsta-killaz are sadistic, underhanded beast-hunters who eagerly employ every kunnin’ trick in the book to capture their quarry and defeat those who would stand in their way.

abilities.name: Bait and Trap
abilities.lore: The Monsta‑killaz have perfected the art of baiting even the most fearsome monsters into debilitating traps.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is damaged. On a 3+, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: A Tough Grot To Swallow
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a RAMPAGE ability for an enemy MONSTER within 6" of this unit
abilities.lore: The spiky-armoured Klutcha-grot is usually gobbled up by the Monsta-killaz’ prey, causing it to choke, retch and vomit up the little git. Of course, sometimes the grot just gets eaten, which the orruks find equally hilarious.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, that RAMPAGE ability has no effect. On a 1, remove this unit’s Klutcha-grot from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Klutcha-grot
abilities.effect: This unit’s Klutcha-grot is a token. If it is removed from the battlefield, this unit cannot use the ‘A Tough Grot to Swallow’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Man-skewer Boltboyz
warscrolls.fluff: The fiendish crossbows wielded by the Man-skewer Boltboyz are powerful enough to take down a charging grunta with one shot, while the poisons coating their projectiles induce spasming deaths that are highly entertaining to these cruel orruks.

abilities.name: Man-skewer Crossbows
abilities.lore: Boltboyz either unleash quick volleys at nearby foes or take careful aim at far-off targets.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a SHOOT ability, pick either the Hasty Shot or Aimed Shot weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its Man‑skewer Crossbows.

abilities.name: Pick 'Em Off
abilities.lore: Boltboyz prefer to remain stationary to fire carefully aimed shots.
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a MOVE ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Marshcrawla Sloggoth
warscrolls.fluff: Creeping along on all fours come the Marshcrawla Sloggoths, sniffing the air to home in on fresh prey. On their backs are howdahs full of sneaky grots, banging war-drums and cackling as their vile beasts catch and squish the foe.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.lore: Troggoths are able to regrow injured flesh almost as quickly as it is harmed.
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: On Da March
abilities.lore: The drummer that rides with a snatcha-krew beats out a powerful rhythm upon his kettle drum that inspires the Kruleboyz around them to race headlong toward the enemy.
abilities.effect: While they are wholly within 12" of this unit, friendly KRULEBOYZ INFANTRY units can use CHARGE abilities even if they used a RUN ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Morkspit Marsh
warscrolls.fluff: Morkspit Marshes are amongst the most grisly examples of orruk kunnin’. These squelchy spells transform hard earth into bogland formed of brackish waters, stinking tar, or any other disgusting substance they can think of. From them emerge tendrils of glowing protoplasm that grasp an enemies’ limbs and drag them towards their doom. With their victims otherwise occupied, the orruks can easily move in behind them and bash them across the back of the head.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Destruction, Ironjawz, Kruleboyz

abilities.name: Tricksy Footing
abilities.lore: Those who stagger into these eldritch quagmires must use all their strength simply to avoid being pulled under.
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 6" of this MANIFESTATION.

abilities.name: Grasping Gunge
abilities.lore: The arcane protoplasm of a Morkspit Marsh seizes limbs tight, dragging at those who draw too close.
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use RUN abilities while they are within 6" of this MANIFESTATION.

warscrolls.name: Murknob with Belcha-banna
warscrolls.fluff: Murknobs are champion warriors amongst the Kruleboyz, and they revel in taking the heads of their adversaries – honestly or otherwise. They alone are granted the honour of carrying the Belcha-bannas into battle, each a foul relic with all manner of strange powers.

abilities.name: Power of Kragnos
abilities.lore: When the energy of the Waaagh! hangs thick in the air, the Belcha-banna channels the mighty power of Kragnos himself, emboldening the Kruleboyz around it and warding off harmful sorcery.
abilities.effect: Friendly KRULEBOYZ units have WARD (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Breath of the Mire-drakes
abilities.lore: Belcha-bannas are typically built around the severed tongue of a mire-drake, creatures so vile that even after death, their remains belch forth clouds of soulshrivelling gas.
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 1, this ability has no effect. On a 2-5, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. On a 6, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Killaboss on Great Gnashtoof
warscrolls.fluff: Mounted atop a tireless and tremendously foul-tempered Gnashtoof, a Killaboss can more easily run down and impale his victims. These beasts are perfectly suited for the deadly terrain of Ghyran’s battlegrounds, prowling amidst the undergrowth and searching for unworthy prey to drag down and disembowel.

abilities.name: Drag 'Em Out
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Killaboss picks the toughest-looking git and has their Gnashtoof drag them away from their allies.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy INFANTRY HERO in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2D6. This unit can move a distance in inches up to the value of the roll. Then, if possible, your opponent must remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again within 1" of this unit.

abilities.name: Prowling the Flanks
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: The Killaboss lurks at the edges of the battle looking for weaknesses in the enemy’s lines.
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within 6" of the battlefield edge, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 6" of the battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Swampboss Skumdrekk
warscrolls.fluff: Always eager to take advantage of death and mayhem, the sadistic Swampboss Skumdrekk travels to Ghyran in search of beasts and prisoners for his monster pits. Mounted atop his repulsive mount Sloppklaw, Skumdrekk doles out pain wherever he roams, gambling with the lives of his minions and enemies alike.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Sloppklaw’s Bite and Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Thrashing Tail
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Sloppklaw sweeps his tail through a group of foes, throwing them to the ground so that he can trample and gore them with impunity.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is less than or equal to the number of models in the target unit, for the rest of the turn, each time this unit uses an ATTACK ability, if all of the attacks target that enemy unit, those attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+. This ability also affects Companion weapons.

abilities.name: Rigged Odds
abilities.lore: Skumdrekk never takes a bet unless the outcome is heavily swayed his way.
abilities.effect:
The first time you fail a dirty trick roll each turn, give this unit 1 betting chip.

Each time you make a dirty trick roll for an ability that targets a unit wholly within 12" of this unit, you can spend any number of betting chips after seeing the result of the roll. For each betting chip you spend, add 1 to that dirty trick roll.

warscrolls.name: Skaregob Totem
warscrolls.fluff: Skaregob Totems leer ominously through the marsh-murk. Each acts as a lodestone of Morkish magic, the energies of sinister cunning spiralling around them and seeing the strange algae splattered across them glowing with psychedelic frenzy. One who looks upon a Skaregob finds themselves assailed by whispers and jeers, their secrets laid bare through hostile mutterings and their nerves stretched to breaking point. As order breaks down, the Kruleboyz draw in closer, chuckling to themselves – just waiting for the distracted foe to stumble into the traps they have prepared...

abilities.name: Up We Go!
abilities.lore: The orruk hauls themselves up to the idol’s platform.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Shouty Boss, pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ INFANTRY HERO that is not in combat and is within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Shouty Boss (see ‘Man da Tower!’).

abilities.name: I'm Off!
abilities.lore: The orruk makes a quick exit.
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shouty Boss.

abilities.name: Sinister Stare
abilities.lore: Kruleboyz find it hilarious to subject foes under the insidious influence of a Skaregob Totem’s hallucinogenic fogs to a host of nasty surprises.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to dirty trick rolls for friendly KRULEBOYZ units wholly within 12" of this terrain feature or for enemy units within 12" of this terrain feature. If this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss, add 1 to dirty trick rolls for friendly KRULEBOYZ units wholly within 18" of this terrain feature instead of wholly within 12" or for enemy units within 18" of this terrain feature instead of within 12".

abilities.name: Man Da Tower!
abilities.lore: Orruk bosses know they look dead impressive when lording it up from an idol of their god.
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss:

• The Shouty Boss cannot use Move abilities.
•Instead of measuring range or visibility to and from the Shouty Boss, measure to and from this terrain feature instead.
•All attacks that would target the Shouty Boss target this terrain feature instead.
•If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Shouty Boss. Then, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Shouty Boss. If it is not possible to set up the Shouty Boss, it is slain.

warscrolls.name: Snatchaboss on Sludgeraker Beast
warscrolls.fluff: Experts at capturing prisoners in the mayhem of battle, Snatchabosses regard war as an opportunity to scoop up some prize captives. The Sludgeraker Beasts that bear them into the fighting smell so appalling their scent alone can unman a prospective target.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Sludgeraker’s Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Sludgeraker Venom
abilities.lore: The underbelly of a Sludgeraker Beast is coated in rotting detritus, encrusted marsh-slime and the beast’s own secretions – a highly virulent mixture that is used by nearby Kruleboyz to coat their weapons.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: That unit has the SLUDGERAKER VENOM keyword for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Festering Wounds
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: A Sludgeraker’s talons and fangs are so coated with toxins and grime that wounds they inflict swiftly turn foul and gangrenous.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units that had any damage points allocated to them this turn by attacks made by this unit or a friendly unit with the SLUDGERAKER VENOM keyword to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+:
• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks until the end of the next turn.

warscrolls.name: Swampboss Skumdrekk
warscrolls.fluff: Swampboss Skumdrekk is something of a legend amongst the Gitsnatchaz, for not only does he excel in the shifting tides of battle, he makes a fortune out of bidding on the outcome. He and his hobgrot Kountin’ Krew are the bane of enemies and treasuries alike.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Sloppklaw’s Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Kountin' Krew
abilities.lore: Swampboss Skumdrekk keeps his hobgrot lackeys, known as his ‘Kountin’ Krew’, close to hand. So close, in fact, that it is they who get first dibs on the toxic sludge that coats the underbelly of his Sludgeraker.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Hobgrot Slittaz unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, the target’s Slitta-knives have Crit (Mortal) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Aggravate Wounds
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: The ornery and near-sighted Sloppklaw has developed a keen scent for weakness, and he will eagerly tear into wounded prey in a savage frenzy.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Bet-master
abilities.lore: Skumdrekk and his hobgrot Kountin’ Krew take bets at the start of a battle as to which of the enemy will be first to die.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit on the battlefield to be the bet.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit and friendly Hobgrot Slittaz units that target the bet.

warscrolls.name: Swampcalla Shaman with Pot-grot
warscrolls.fluff: Even for Kruleboyz, Swampcalla Shamans are foul creatures. These spell-flingers have an innate connection to the mires they inhabit, which they channel into noisome spells of debilitation while brewing up vile elixirs to aid their green- skinned kin.

abilities.name: Foul Elixirs
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Swampcalla Shamans brew up disgusting but life-saving elixirs, which they distribute to their Kruleboyz mates to aid them in battle.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ INFANTRY unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn. On a 1, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Pot-grot
abilities.lore: This little grot is given the important role of ‘stirrin’ da pot’.
abilities.effect: This unit’s Pot-grot is a token. Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit while its Pot-grot is on the battlefield. If you make an unmodified casting roll of 4 or less for this unit, remove its Pot-grot from the battlefield.

rules.name: Swamp Shroud
rules.lore: Before the warriors of a Kruleboyz Klaw strike, the shamans enact a mighty ritual to smother the battlefield in a thick, stinky mist that conceals them from the enemy.
rules.effect: Friendly KRULEBOYZ units that are wholly within 3" of a terrain feature are not visible to enemy units that are more than 12" away from them.

rules.name: Ded Sneaky
rules.lore: Comprised of hobgrots and ‘yoofs’, the ladz of the Light Finga are in charge of ‘nikkin’ stuff and are skilled at sneaking up on the enemy.
rules.effect: You can use the ‘Sneaky Sneakin'’ DIRTY TRICK ability twice per turn instead of only once per turn.

rules.name: Krule Mockery
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
rules.lore: These orruks have perfected the art of hurling biting insults at the enemy to taunt them and lure them into hidden traps.
rules.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ unit to be the Insult Hurla, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of it to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
rules.effect: Until the start of your next turn, each time the target uses a MOVE ability and does not end that move closer to the Insult Hurla than it was at the start of that move, inflict D6 mortal damage on the target after that MOVE ability has been resolved.

rules.name: Far-killa Bolts
rules.lore: The many Deffspikerz of the Middul Finger often keep a limited supply of bolts fletched with bog-shryke feathers, which give their shots that extra bit of distance when needed.
rules.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Man‑skewer Boltboyz or Beast-skewer Killbow units to be the targets.
rules.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 3" to the Range characteristic of the targets’ ranged weapons.

rules.name: Gangin' Up
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
rules.lore: These orruks like to overwhelm their enemies with a flurry of strikes from all directions interspersed with sneaky stabs and low blows.
rules.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ unit to be the target. That unit must be in combat with an enemy unit that is in combat with another friendly KRULEBOYZ unit. Kragnos cannot be picked to be the target.
rules.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

rules.name: Meanest Beasts
rules.lore: The warbeasts ridden by the orruks of the Trophy Finga are particularly foul and belligerent specimens of their kind.
rules.effect: Companion weapons used by friendly KRULEBOYZ units have Crit (2 Hits).

spells.name: Summon Gork-Roara
spells.lore: The shaman summons a leering visage of Gorkamorka that spills forth Waaagh! power.
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly Gork-Roara on the battlefield, pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a Gork-Roara wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

spells.name: Summon Morkspit Marsh
spells.lore: The shaman summons a cruel, glowing swamp that channels memories of Gorkamorka’s past brawls.
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly Morkspit Marsh on the battlefield, pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a Morkspit Marsh wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Foot of Gork
spells.lore: Stamping a furiously belligerent beat, the shaman dares Gork himself to stomp the battlefield flat.
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly Foot of Gork on the battlefield, pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a Foot of Gork wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A Foot of Gork has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

spells.name: Mork's Kunnin'
spells.lore: The shaman channels the raw power of Mork to imbue their allies with uncanny cunning so they might evade enemy blows.
spells.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly KRULEBOYZ unit wholly within 12" of them, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to save rolls for the target.

spells.name: Choking Mist
spells.lore: The shaman summons a cloud of corrosive vapour that scorches the lungs of any caught within it.
spells.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: Da Black Pit
spells.lore: The shaman taps his staff on the ground. Forking out from that spot, and surging towards a nearby foe, the earth turns into a noisome quagmire that sucks victims below its surface to their doom.
spells.declare: Pick a friendly KRULEBOYZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
